humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there was only one sentinel lymph node examined and it had no metastases (macrometastases or micrometastases). Based on the new rule 11, N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that one sentinel lymph node was examined and no tumor was found in it (`Number of sentinel lymph nodes examined 1. Number of lymph nodes with macrometastases: 0. Number of lymph nodes with micrometastases: 0`). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
